sense.def:
One's contention
je zamisel ali mnenje, ki ga nekdo izraža.

seg.quote: My contention is that we must offer all our children the same opportunities.

sense.def:
Contention
je nesporazum ali spor o nečem.

seg.quote: This is an issue of great contention at the moment.

sense.def:
Če je človek na nekem tekmovanju
in contention
, ima možnost za zmago.

cit.quote: v ožjem izboru, biti kandidat za zmago
